name: Flight Unlimited Helicopter
description:
*This flight simulator features console quality visuals. The game is optimized for the iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, and iPad. Owners of older devices restart the device to avoid a crash - iPad 1 and iPhone 3GS not supported*

Graphics Performance Scale:
iPhone 5 - Excellent
iPad 3 - Excellent
iPhone 4S - Excellent
iPad 2 - Excellent
iPhone 4 - Great
iPad 1 - Fair (restart device to avoid crashing)
iPod Touch 4 - Fair (restart device to avoid crashing)

Experience the thrill of cruising over Las Vegas, the Grand Canyon, and Downtown Los Angeles in one of 8 unique helicopters.

Hover over iconic Las Vegas hotels, cruise down the strip, and take in the views of the Grand Canyon.
Flight Unlimited also features street traffic. Cars, trucks, and buses zoom around the city

Features:
- 3 areas to explore - Las Vegas, Grand Candyon, and Downtown Los Angeles

- Las Vegas features over 130 sq miles of iconic buildings, hotels, and streets. The hotels are modeled with photo realism.

- The game engine recognizes the device being used (iPod 4, iPhone4, iPhone 4S, or iPhone 5) and optimizes the graphics to their maximum potential

- Volumetric clouds and enhanced lighting effects

- Up to 10 different helicopters to pilot

- Realistic flight model with virtual controls

- Cockpit camera, Chase camera, Tower camera, and a full customizable camera

- Street traffic (cars and buses)
